subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: SchemaCrawler allows scripting with database metadata, using JavaScript. This example shows how to "chain" or run multiple SchemaCrawler commands.

ol.li: Make sure that the Java executable is on your path. (J2SE 6 or better is required.)

Copy the schemacrawler.config.properties
file into the chain example directory.
Start the database server by running StartDatabaseServer script from the distribution directory.
Start a command shell in the chain example directory.

Run chain.cmd chain.js
(or chain.sh chain.js
on Unix).
Try modifying the JavaScript in the *.js files to run different SchemaCrawler commands.
